body.name: GIVANLEE Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair,Computer/Desk Chair/Couch,Back Support Pillow Adjustable for Chair,Patented 6 semi-Circular Foldable Back Cushion Hanging on Office Chair,Soft
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: 【OFFICE CHAIR BACK SUPPORT PILLOW UNIQUE DESIGN】:Givanlee unique design of flexible hanging back pillow is different from many other lumbar cushions,this patented back pillow is made from a combination of 6 semi-circular columns.As this feature, this adjustable pillow can be adjusted to the pillow you want and relieve your neck,upper,mid and lower back pain and back tightness.

【NOT JUST A BACK PILLOW - THREE IN ONE】:If you spend a lot of time at the office,I'm sure you need more than one pillow.You might need a lumbar support pillow,a back cushion,a neck pillow.This pillow has a three in one function,but you only need to pay for one.And it also works as a couch pillow.
【DURABLE HIGHEST QUALITY FOAM】:This back cushion is made of premium sponges, which are super soft and very elastic, which is much better than memory sponges (Because memory sponge is slow rebound).
【BREATHABLE & WASHABLE COVER】:The cover is made of high quality short plush fabric,it's removable and machine washable mesh cover.

【ADJUSTABLE STRAP for HOLD IN PLACE】：A adjustable buckled straps ensure the back cushion stay in place, stop the lumbar pillow from sliding down.This adjusting belt is not fixed to the pillow, it is a separate belt, and can be fixed anywhere you want. Of course, to prevent this belt from being lost, we have a small pocket on the side of the pillow for storing.
body.description: Givanlee Lumbar Support Pillow for Office Chair Multifunctional Back Pillow High Quality Soft Foam:GIVANLEE has designed two different softness back pillows. If you want a slightly more supportive pillow, please choose medium softness. Premium Mesh Cover Breathable & Washable:Keeping air circulation well and always keep you back cool suitable A adjustable buckled straps

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: My husband had a stroke (bed bound). Sitting right next to his bed sit & sleep in 2 extra large folding camping chairs facing each other. I have purchased great cushions to sit on, neck support when I slept, & tried several back pillows that didn't work. This item is perfect for me. It supports, so comfortable, & is not hot!!! During the day I use it upright in the chair. When I slept I turn it sideways in the chair with my neck cushion. When I lay down I fold it up for support under my legs. Helps with my pelvic & IC issues. God bless🌹🙏

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish I had found this support cushion a lot earlier in life. I am thrilled to find such a unique cushion. It's like an accordion. Every part of my shoulder blades and back are now supported as I sit in my round chair at night. It has made a big difference in my pain level. Thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to put on my recliner because the back of the recliner leans back to far. It helps me sit up straighter. I love it. I would have given it a 5 but it doesn't stay in place and has to be adjusted often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as firm as pictured
reviews.reviewText: I like that it's adjustable, but the picture shows a person whole upper body weight laying on a bed and the pillow is not sunken in. I thought the pillow would be firmer to provide more support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better quality than expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow based on generally positive comments and it doesn't disappoint. One thing I will chime in with others is that the strap connecting the pillow to the chair is too weak for it to stay in place. If you move, the pillow may move out of place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not just for lumbar, nice multi-purpose
reviews.reviewText: (I rarely do reviews) Rec'vd recently--shipping was fast!...am still testing it; very nice for using as pillow/head rest. The panels are convenient for adding more support/height. Hopefully the filler will hold up in the long run. Purchased several for family members, mom: lumbar, sons: backs, daughter: comfort. While packaging sleeve is nice, seems reusable, since it was nearly impossible to pull item out, it will take Superman-strength to put it back in. Seems to be durable for most individuals/"average"-size...I am 5'2"/130lbs (average-size?). Hope this helps...will see if I can add to review after a while, esp if any drastic changes. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG THE BEST AND MOST VERSATILE BACK CUSHION I'VE EVER HAD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Ok let's get one POSSIBLE, and slight negative out of the way: IF you may have an extra high-back chair, you may conclude that this back cushion isn't long enough...?? In my view; it "is" long enough, for me, because even though I do, in fact, have a high-back chair (i.e. a "big and tall" model chair), this back cushion does in fact cover the entire back...from top to bottom, BUT it doesn't loop over the top of the chair, like it is shown in some pictures of it, looping/hanging over a chair. What's the big deal? Well; if it can loop over the top/back of a chair, it can be weighted/situated perfectly, so as not to require any periodic adjusting or moving around or whatever.... But that's not a big deal, to me, because each time I sit down, I very simply take a few seconds, to maneuver it to right where I want it, and it remains there, for as long as I'm seated... So; is that a big deal, or a deal-breaker?? Not at all. The only thing that that means is that the thing is "less than perfect". Bottom line for ME is: I LOVE THIS THING!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clever solution for making chairs more comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I have a Steelcase Gesture chair, and since day 1, I've found it uncomfortable.I opted for using another lumbar support pillow: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01IJNJAZ0This did help some, but it was still quite uncomfortable.Then I ordered this product (GIVANLEE) and it is a game-changer.First, I'd like to add the caveat that I've only used it for a couple of hours, and it may take days or weeks for me to notice issues.But my first impressions are quite good.The GIVANLEE pillow really does make my chair so much more comfortable than my previous solution.It is quite a clever and flexible solution, and there don't seem to be too many products like it.I *will* mention two potential issues I've noticed so far:1. It can get decently warm after a few minutes of use. But not too bad.2. I feel like that mid-back area needs a bit more support. But I've managed to solve that by putting a very small pillow between the chair and the GIVANLEE pillow.

I'm using this on my desk chair, which is a decent desk chair that offers some lumbar support function and whatever but I've always found it hard.This cushion flows with the shape of my chair really well, while providing me with some comfortable cushioning.I have mine all the way down to the bottom of the chair and one "block" hangs over the top. It NEVER moves or shifts or slides (something I found very problematic with the 2 lumbar cushions I tried before this one).I've been using this for a month and think it's perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a little pricey but overall it's OK.
reviews.reviewText: Works great on my office chair ,though I would not recommend this for a living room recliner.The ad only shows this for an office syle chair.

reviews.reviewTitle: I should have just bought a fluffy towel
reviews.reviewText: The product pictures are very deceiving, the cushion is very thin, I would have been better off buying fluffy towel or blanket for a 1/4 of the price and it would have been cheaper and more comfortable. The only good thing is that there are zippers on the back so I will be able to remove the cheap foam that it came with and I'll just stuff it with something that will actually fill out the cushion. Very disappointed.
